front.title: Applicability of MCP for the Network Management

abstract.t: The application of MCP in the network management field is meant to develop various rich AI driven network applications, realize intent based networks management automation in the multi-vendor heterogeneous network environment. This document discusses the applicability of MCP to the network management in the IP network that utilizes IETF technologies. It explores operational aspect, key components, generic workflow and deployment scenarios. The impact of integrating MCP into the network management system is also discussed.
